sql_insert: INSERT INTO all_accounts (account_id) SELECT value->>'predecessor_id' FROM jsonb_array_elements($1::jsonb) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

endpoints.query: SELECT jsonb_build_object('account_id', account_id) FROM all_accounts WHERE account_id LIKE ($1->>'prefix') || '%' LIMIT 50
SELECT jsonb_build_object('account_id', account_id) FROM all_accounts WHERE reverse(account_id) LIKE reverse($1->>'suffix') || '%' LIMIT 50
SELECT jsonb_build_object('count', COUNT(*)) FROM all_accounts WHERE account_id LIKE ($1->>'prefix') || '%'
SELECT jsonb_build_object('count', COUNT(*)) FROM all_accounts WHERE account_id LIKE '%' || ($1->>'suffix')
